item.title: Serva
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:3, topic:541570”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=660441.msg4415904#msg4415904 date=1395887160]
can’t have both in a community where people don’t know shit. best bet is one of the Apollo or runesource bases. Elysium and azure are content full, but not sure on the credibility of the code.

your best bet is to just write content-handling systems, then dump the data or have someone else dump it for you.

it doesn’t take long to write skill bases, it’s only time consuming populating data.
[/quote]

I’m a client developer. Writing skills and mini games it’s not my type. Thanks for your output.[/quote]

If you’re a client developer why not try and fix up that 194 I released lol

Read full topic
